data.name: Sift Heads - Reborn
data.detailed_description:
Ready to be involved into a red and dark world of crime?
Team up with Vinnie, Kiro & Shorty against different cartels around the globe.

Buy different ammo, guns and weapons and upgrade it in this epic Shooting game. Gain skills for each character as the adventure gets more intense!
FEATURES
√ Hours of gameplay! Over 80 missions
√ Choose your own tactics for battle: sniper, shotgun, machine gun or assault rifles
√ Find collectables around the criminal organisations
√ Explore 5 cities
√ Tougher mode to unlock
√ Intuitive control and easy interface - swipe, aim and shoot
√ Perfect optimization
√ Regular updates and chapters to come...

data.short_description: Discover a red and dark world of crime. Team up with Vinnie, Kiro & Shorty against different cartels around the globe.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
